reviewText: Warning: This is not a DVD, but a DVD-R. I watched the first 30 minutes and feel the visual clarity at about 85% and the audio fidelity about same. Appears to be a helpful video, though. But you'll have to work with the above mentioned issues. I notified seller and he was very nice. I got a full refund upon return, including cost of return shipping. I notified Amazon that this was a burned DVD-R and not a factory stamped DVD. Now it is up to them. Right.
